sentences.en: The dramatic false-color image also highlights the contributions of hydrogen, sulfur, and oxygen, energized by intense ultraviolet radiation, to the nebular glow.
sentences.cn: 这张生动的假色影像还突出了氢，硫和氧元素的作用，在强紫外线辐射下，星云发出炽热的光芒。

sentences.en: The remnant nebular gas pervades the interplanetary space.
sentences.cn: 星云的残余气体充斥星际空间.

sentences.en: Ultraviolet radiation from the hot star powers the nebular glow.
sentences.cn: 热恒星的紫外辐射使星云发光。

sentences.en: Within the Iris, dusty nebular material surrounds a hot, young star.
sentences.cn: 在彩虹星云中，星云尘埃物质围绕着一颗炙热的年轻恒星。

words.tran_cn: 朦胧的；星云的，星云状的
